dcterms:creator: Alireza Famili
Jung-Min (Jerry) Park
dcterms:description: ROLATIN is a dataset focused on robust localization and tracking for indoor navigation of drones, providing data for evaluating localization techniques in GPS-denied environments.
dcterms:title: ROLATIN

dcterms:creator: Alireza Famili
Angelos Stavrou
Haining Wang
Jung-Min Park
dcterms:description: RAIL is a dataset that provides robust acoustic indoor localization data for drones, focusing on the use of acoustic signals for precise localization.
dcterms:title: RAIL

dcterms:creator: Wenguang Mao
Zaiwei Zhang
Lili Qiu
Jian He
Yuchen Cui
Sangki Yun
dcterms:description: The Indoor Follow Me Drone dataset provides data for evaluating drone navigation techniques in indoor environments, focusing on following behavior.
dcterms:title: Indoor Follow Me Drone

dcterms:creator: José Paredes
Fernando Álvarez
Teodoro Aguilera
José Manuel Villadangos
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on 3D indoor positioning of UAVs using spread spectrum ultrasound and time-of-flight cameras, providing data for localization accuracy evaluation.
dcterms:title: 3D Indoor Positioning of UAVs

dcterms:creator: Laurent Segers
Jelmer Tiete
An Braeken
Abdellah Touhafi
dcterms:description: The Ultrasonic Multiple-Access Ranging System dataset provides data for indoor localization using spread spectrum and MEMS technology, focusing on multiple access ranging.
dcterms:title: Ultrasonic Multiple-Access Ranging System

dcterms:creator: R. Sharma
V. Badarla
dcterms:description: This dataset analyzes a novel beacon placement strategy for 3D localization in indoor spaces, providing insights into optimizing beacon arrangements.
dcterms:title: Beacon Placement Strategy for 3D Localization
